author: geirm
msg: Switched things so that the 'jar' target is built w/o any external
dependencies included in the jar, and 'jar-dep' is built with the Oro
and LogKit deps. The J2EE follow the same pattern.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch

author: geirm
msg: Added notion of 'ApplicationContext', an Object that is set by the
application environment, and then acessible from any pluggable object
like loaders or loggers to allow communication between app environment
Tested with an example - will add to /examples if I can clean it up
